item.title: AI didn’t replace me as a doctor. It made me better.
item.description: Future clinicians should be training on how to use this technology effectively.

item.title: Trump’s nixing of this bridge to Canada would be economic malpractice
item.description: Turning down a fully built, Canadian-funded span hurts U.S. competitiveness.

item.title: Here’s the smartest way the U.S. can promote regime change in Iran
item.description: What is needed in this moment is the empowerment of the Iranian opposition.

item.title: Can the Colorado GOP get serious?
item.description: State Republicans risk blowing their best opening to make gains in years.

item.title: This Minnesota wilderness is the wrong place for a copper mine
item.description: A Senate vote could endanger some beautiful American backcountry.

item.title: Tariffs were illegal. The delayed refunds are wrong.
item.description: The government said small business would be made whole. It’s time to pay up.

item.description: The justice can stand up for his colleagues Trump called ‘fools and lapdogs.’

item.title: Setting the record straight about aluminum in vaccines
item.description: People are exposed to far more aluminum from food and drink than from vaccines.

item.description: Susan Rice wants Democrats to go after companies that supposedly played nice with the president.

item.title: Price caps won’t make food more affordable

item.description: Government has a role, but private enterprises do it better.

item.title: China tried to buy the world. It failed.
item.description: Financial investment is no substitute for the power that real force provides.

item.title: An arbitrary rule change is threatening America’s health care system

item.description: Arsenal and some other Premier League teams have sordid connections.

item.title: The No. 1 item food stamps buy is a travesty. Now states can say no.
item.description: States are empowered to block taxpayer funds from being used on junk food.

item.title: The U.S. is sleepwalking into war with Iran. Trump won’t explain why.
item.description: With Trump’s motives and objectives so unclear, it’s little wonder that talks aren’t working.

item.title: Fixing America’s broken nuclear fuel supply
item.description: Growth and AI advances can’t come without big leaps in energy production.
